name: Genie-soft
tag_list: backup, restore, disaster-recvoery, real-time-backup, time-machine, windows-time-machine
overview:
Genie-Soft is a backup software provider with products available in 10 languages for business and individual use.

The company helps customers protect their valuable data by providing disaster recovery, backup and restore products for businesses and consumers of any skill. Genie-Soft licenses its products through a network of resellers, distributors and dealers, retail outlets, as well as indirectly through systems integrators, managed service providers, technology partners, original equipment manufacturer (OEM) partners, and distribution and volume partners and through its own Website at http://www.genie-soft.com
